name: Prana Cozy Up Tank - Women's
description:
Sweater season doesn’t have a monopoly on cozy, cozy is timeless. Achieve next-level comfort in this super-soft tank, and embrace cozy all year long.Sustainable hemp, recycled polyester and TENCEL™ Lyocell blend jersey.UPF 30+ material blocks more than 96% of harmful UV.Scoop neck and arm holes have a gentle binding.Straight hem looks good flowing freely or with a French tuck.Regular fit feels just right.

        Sustainability
